entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
